title: Permits licensed physician, visiting nurse, nurse, physical therapist or chiropractor to park where parking is prohibited if vehicle is identified by special placard
summary: Permits licensed physician, visiting nurse, nurse, physical therapist or chiropractor to park where parking is prohibited if vehicle is identified by special plate; permits such parking for a period not to exceed 1 hour while attending to a patient in the immediate vicinity.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to parking regulations
